imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Morning show promotional banner with sunrise theme and radio microphone (morning-show-banner.dim_800x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new show entry for a morning show with ID, title, description, and optional image

new_feature_requests.summary: Add weekends with Mark Huotari 2pm-7pm CST to schedule
Create a new show entry for 'Weekends with Mark Huotari' if it doesn't already exist
Add schedule entries for Saturday and Sunday from 2:00 PM to 7:00 PM CST for the 'Weekends with Mark Huotari' show
Display the new weekend schedule entries in the ScheduleView component on the homepage
Add a morning show to the schedule
Add a weekday morning schedule entry for the new morning show with appropriate time slot (e.g., 6:00 AM - 10:00 AM)
